articles.description: Cricket News: India batter Shubman Gill acknowledges the influence of legendary cricketer MS Dhoni and highlights the nation's enduring fondness for the former captain. Gill's tribute to Dhoni resonates widely among fans.

articles.author: Sanya Jain
articles.title: Yashasvi Jaiswal’s success story: From earning Rs 300 a week to Rs 5 crore Mumbai home - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Cricketer Yashasvi Jaiswal has purchased an apartment for Rs 5.38 crore. The apartment is located in Mumbai - the same city where Jaiswal used to sleep in tent and sell pani-puri to earn a living.
articles.content: Success has not come easy to Yashasvi Jaiswal. At an age when children rely on their parents for pocket money, the young cricketer was sleeping in tents and selling pani-puri in Mumbai to survive all… [+1848 chars]

articles.author: Venkat Narayanan
articles.title: 12 sixes against England vs 12 sixes against Zimbabwe: Wasim Akram opines on Yashasvi Jaiswal matching his world record - Crictoday.com (Cricket News)
articles.description: Indian opener Yashasvi Jaiswal secures a stunning double century and equals Wasim Akram's world record for most sixes in a single Test match, contributing to India's victory over England.
articles.content: In a stunning display of batting prowess, Indian opener Yashasvi Jaiswal not only secured a brilliant double century against England but also matched the world record set by the legendary Wasim Akram… [+1533 chars]
